entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 02 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Warm Temperatures this Week Increase Snow Melt and the Potential for Flooding... Warm temperatures are expected through Wednesday, which will continue to melt low elevation and foothill snow across far western Wyoming. High temperatures in the valleys will range from 55 to 65 each afternoon with a few readings into the 70s.
